cyclone.name: MARCO
cyclone.current_location: about 240 miles SSE of the Mouth of the Mississippi River
cyclone.trajectory: Forecast to turn northwest then west-northwest, approaching the south-central Louisiana coast Monday and drifting westward inland toward east Texas mid-week
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: south-central Louisiana coast near Morgan City

weather_observation.watch_coast: Storm Surge Watch Sabine Pass TX to Morgan City LA; Hurricane Watch Intracoastal City LA to west of Morgan City; Tropical Storm Watch MS/AL border to AL/FL border
weather_observation.warning_coast: Storm Surge Warning Morgan City LA to Ocean Springs MS; Hurricane Warning Morgan City LA to Pearl River Mouth; Tropical Storm Warning Pearl River Mouth to MS/AL border and Cameron LA to west of Morgan City
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Central Gulf Coast from Louisiana through Mississippi and Alabama, with lesser effects possible along the upper Texas coast
weather_observation.wind: Low (≤10%) chance of sustained tropical-storm-force winds; occasional gusty squalls possible late Tuesday into Wednesday
weather_observation.storm_surge: Minor surge 1–2 ft possible along upper Texas coast including Galveston Bay
weather_observation.rainfall: 1–3 inches of rain possible in outer rain bands; localized flash-ponding in poor drainage areas
weather_observation.other_hazards: Dangerous rip currents along Gulf beaches and possible brief coastal flooding at high tide
